survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees who have participated in corporate training programs to assess effectiveness, relevance, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall quality of the training program you attended?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistent rating. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall quality of the training program you attended?

questions.question_text: Which of the following training topics were most useful to you? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional topics not listed.

script.question_text: Which of the following training topics were most useful to you? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What specific improvements would you suggest for future training programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response to 250 characters.

script.question_text: What specific improvements would you suggest for future training programs?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to apply the skills learned in this training to your current role?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale. Ensure the question is clear and concise.

script.question_text: How likely are you to apply the skills learned in this training to your current role?

questions.question_text: Did the training meet your expectations? If not, please explain why.
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 is rated 'Average', 'Below Average', or 'Poor'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback. Limit response to 500 characters.

script.question_text: Did the training meet your expectations? If not, please explain why.
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 is rated 'Average', 'Below Average', or 'Poor'
